ComicInfo.Title: Islamophobia Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
"ISLAMOPHOBIA," Part One. Dwayne, Jimmy, and Samaritan working together? Hypocrisy and prejudice reach an all-new level with more adrenaline-fueled heists!
